title: Didn't get my Chroma Chamionship Ashe
body: So I bought the Golden chroma and ward skin in the loot menu but didnt previously buy the ashe championship skin. does this mean I just wasted my loot tokens?

replies.body: You'll need to have the skin itself to be able to use the Chromas.  It will remain on your account indefinitely, so it's available if you ever receive the skin at a later date.  Let me know if you have any questions!
Yes, if you dont plan to buy the skin first. Next time you buy/obtain championship ashe, you will have the chroma
